skills.name: BANE OF PEACE
desc: • Deal 2 hits of random damage to all enemies that increases based on your SPECIAL stat.
• Permanently lower DEF on all enemies by 10%.
• Inflict Bleed, Furious Burn, and Grievous Burn for 3 turns.
• Gain Echo for 2 turns.

skills.name: VIRAL POX
desc: • Deal random damage to all enemies that increases based on your SPECIAL stat.
• Prevent all enemies from healing until they die. This does not apply to bosses.
• Enemies take true damage equal to 6% of their MAX HP every action they take for 3 turns.

skills.name: TREACHEROUS TRANSMISSION
desc: • Deal 2 hits of random damage to all enemies that increases based on your SPECIAL stat.
• Permanently lower MR on all enemies by 10%.
• Inflict Shock, Scalding Burn and Blinding Burn for 3 turns.
• Inflict HP Drain on all enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: SWARMING PESTILENCE
desc: • Deal random damage to all enemies that increases based on your SPECIAL stat.
• Remove all beneficial effects including Golden effects from all enemies and inflict Innate Bleed for 3 turns for each effect removed this way.

skills.name: MIASMIC SLASH
desc: • Deal 3 hits of random damage to single enemy that increases based on your SPECIAL stat.
• Deal an additional devastating hit of random damage to the enemy if they suffer from any Bleed or Shock effects, including Silver and Innate effects.
• If this attack kills an enemy, inflict 3 Toxic Burns for 3 turns to all enemies and immediately gain an Extra Turn.

skills.name: NIGHT TERROR
desc: • Deal random damage to a single enemy that increases based on your SPECIAL stat.
• Deal additional hits of random damage to the enemy based on the number of Negative and Beneficial effects, including Silver and Golden effects, they have.
• If this kills an enemy, inflict Perfect Crave and 3 Toxic Burns for 3 turns on all enemies and immediately gain an Extra Turn.

skills.name: SCREECH FOR ME
desc: • Deal devastating random damage to all enemies that increases based on your SPECIAL stat.
• Extend Negative Effect Duration on all enemies by 9.
• Permanently kill each enemy if they have 9 or more negative effects and beneficial effects. This effect ignores immunity to Permadeath and does not apply to bosses.
• Instantly gain an Extra Turn.
